alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Collier County through 600 PM EDT... At 527 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Naples, or over Naples, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, East Naples, Naples Manor, Golden Gate, North Naples, Lely and Pelican Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
